greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation of A328618.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..707
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (PARI) A328619(n) = { my(f = factor(n), m, q); for(k=1, #f~, q = (f[k, 2]\f[k, 1]); m = (f[k, 2]%f[k, 1]); if(m&&(f[k,1]!=2), f[k, 2] = q*f[k, 1] + lift(Mod(m,f[k, 1])/2))); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 23 2019
